alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Marion and southern Putnam Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 155 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Delancy to near Sparr. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Juniper Springs, Lynne, Lake Delancy, Sparr and Anthony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam
